Some people have no decency or sense of integrity. There is no movie, no porn; the .rar comes with scenery, object and mesh folders, all pretty basic. It has an installer for region specific AI traffic if you want to use it. Have not yet checked the quality of the scenery package but it installed fine.

... I mean, I add it manually inside FSX, first terrain, then objects. I ignored the mesh. Can´t activate it...

Dam thing works fine. Took a flight from Ciampino (Italy) to Maribor today and everything is excellent. Even had an Air Adria plane at the tarmac when I got there. Didn't know if it was MyTraffic doing a superlative job or static but it didn't really matter, it was regionally accurate.

For all you who can figure out how to pirate but not manipulate your FSX: I made a Slovenia folder, put terrain, objects and mesh inside, dropped it into FSX>Addon Scenery; opened FSX and went to settings, scenery, add new area, and added the items in the same order. I didn't use the AI traffic installer.
